document.full_text: world marathon record holder haile gebrselassie hopes to secure a place in the ethiopian team for the 2012 london olympics with a fast time in the berlin marathon on september 25.
document.title: gebrselassie hopes to secure olympic place in berlin
lines_and_colors: world marathon record holder haile gebrselassie hopes to secure a place in the ethiopian team for the 2012 london olympics with a fast time in the berlin marathon on september 25.
